column5: Woke up this morning and was stoked about going to the Fishing Show with the wife. Weather was mild so after looking out my bedroom window I noticed the deer moving in to feed on some of the vegetation just behind our fence in the conservation area. Grabbed my coffee and my camera and headed out for some shots.   By diggyj, shot with DSC-W5 at 2009-02-14  Here they come, one after the other.   By diggyj, shot with DSC-W5 at 2009-02-14  Can hunting really be this easy?   By diggyj, shot with DSC-W5 at 2009-02-14  After such a great siteing, headed down to the Fishing Show, spent a bomb which angered the wife, end of story. I did make it up to her though.  Dirk....
those are beautiful, great photos thanks for the post!
Nice!!!  Looks like you have a perfect stand for the fall! lol
The mrs,s and I seen a herd of 30 this morning,then seen three together in a bean field.  Great pics.TFS
right on man, thanks for sharing. gotta love being able to watch deer from the comfort of your own home  mike
you know that sound a ruler makes when you flick it off the end of your desk as a young school boy.....ya      boing.
No unfortunately hunting is not that easy ....  whish it was LOL Beautiful pics diggyj  Thanks for sharing Leechman
Great pics thanks for sharing  Here's one from my front yard, not always a good thing.
great pictures of some beautiful animals!   your backyard ,, how nice is that!!??  hope your wife forgives you for the moments of weakness.  lol
